_source.short_desc: Versatile backup solution designed for MSPs to offer managed backup service and earn recurring income.
_source.long_desc: Ahsay Cloud Backup Suite is specifically designed for Managed Service Providers, System Integrator's and IT Consulting Companies. It can empower you to offer secure managed, cloud based, and on-premises backup service to your business or end customers and earn recurring income. Supports database backup for;MS SQL, MS Exchange, Oracle, MySQL, and MariaDB. Virtual machine backup for VMware and Hyper-V, Synology and QNAP NAS devices, Android & iOS mobile devices, and Microsoft 365.
_source.target_audience: Specifically designed for MSPs to offer secure managed, cloud hosted, and on-premises backup service to your business end customers and earn recurring income.

media.caption: AhsayCBS status overall of system resources

category_features.name: Backup Log
category_features.definition: Records the events that occur during a backup process

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Cloud Backup
category_features.definition: Allows back up of files to cloud storage like Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: Copy only the new data that has been changed or created since the previous backup

category_features.name: Backup Scheduling
category_features.definition: Allows automatic backups (with all filtering, compressing, transferring to the storage, and other)

category_features.name: Bare-Metal Restore
category_features.definition: Restore the physical Window Servers, Desktops and Laptops from the scratch

category_features.name: Compression
category_features.definition: Reduction in the number of bits needed to represent data

category_features.name: Continuous Backup
category_features.definition: Backup of computer data  automatically saving a copy of every change made to that data

category_features.name: Differential Backup
category_features.definition: Cumulative backup of all changes made since the last full backup

category_features.name: Disaster Recovery
category_features.definition: Plan and implement business continuity measures in case of unforeseen events

category_features.name: Encryption
category_features.definition: Convert data into a code for security

category_features.name: Incremental Backup
category_features.definition: A type of backup that only copies files that have changed since the previous backup

category_features.name: VM Backup
category_features.definition: Copying of data on a virtual machine (VM) in a VMware environment to prevent data loss

related_products.short_desc: Google Compute Engine provides practically unlimited computing power using VMs in the cloud.
related_products.features: Google Compute Engine, the computing arm of Google Cloud Platform, provides practically unlimited computing power using VMs in the cloud.

related_products.short_desc: Open source virtualization tool that enables users to run multiple operating systems, such as windows, and Macintosh on one machine.
related_products.features: Cross-platform virtualization application that helps you run multiple operating systems simultaneously on one machine. Provides OVF format support and VM group control capability.

related_products.short_desc: NAKIVO Backup & Replication is a reliable and affordable data protection solution for virtual, physical, cloud and SaaS environments.
related_products.features: NAKIVO Backup & Replication is a comprehensive data protection solution delivering incremental, application-aware backup, instant recovery, ransomware protection and disaster recovery orchestration for VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V, Nutanix AHV, Amazon EC2, physical Windows/Linux environments, Microsoft 365 and Oracle Database.

related_products.short_desc: Virtual Machine Backup and Replication for Hyper-V & VMware - Try it for free for 30 days. (Freeware available for micro-businesses.)
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup is a virtual machine backup and replication solution for Hyper-V and VMware. Designed for IT departments, IT resellers and consultants, and Managed Service Providers (MSPs), it provides robust, streamlined, enterprise-level functionality, such as WAN-Optimized Replication, CDP, Augmented Inline Deduplication and more. It is characterized by ease of use, speed, affordability  and a Lightning Fast Support Call Response Guarantee of under 30 seconds. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: Secure and resizable compute capacity in the cloud. Launch applications when needed without upfront commitments.
related_products.features: Amazon EC2 presents a true virtual computing environment, allowing you to use web service interfaces to launch instances with a variety of operating systems, load them with your custom application environment, manage your network's access permissions, and run your image using as many or few systems as you desire.

related_products.short_desc: With Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) you can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows and Linux, on Synology NAS.
related_products.features: Virtual Machine Manager opens up abundant possibilities. You can set up and run various virtual machines, including Windows, Linux, and Ubuntu, on one Synology NAS. Easily allocate hardware resources such as computing power, storage space, or network interfaces among several virtual machines. Clone, restore, or create a failover of virtual machines within seconds, and rest assured that you can rollback any  failure at any time.

DigitalOcean is the Developer Cloud for Modern Apps. We simplify modern app creation for next generation developers working independently, at tech startups, and within SMBs. Our infrastructure- and platform-as-a-service solutions are the first and best at combining the power of simplicity, love for the developer community, an obsession for customer service, and the advantages of open source. Our mission is to bring software development within reach of anyone around the world.

related_products.short_desc: Make it easy for employees to work remotely from any location or device in a secure environment with solutions from VMware & Softchoice
related_products.features: Make it easy for employees to access all their files and applications and work remotely from any location or device in a secure and scalable environment with solutions from VMware and Softchoice. We can help you set up, manage, secure, and optimize IT performance for your remote workforce using VMware solutions. Explore how solutions like VMware Horizon 7 and Workspace ONE can make your IT staff more efficient, save your company money, and maximize your companys end user experience.

related_products.short_desc: Iperius Backup is powerful and ease software for Virtual Machine Backup for VMware ESXi, vCenter, ESXi Free - Microsoft Hyper-V.
related_products.features: Iperius backup a high performance VM backup software that allows IT PROS to backup Hyper-V & VMware VMs with ease in a few clicks. Compatible with vSphere ESXi Cluster. It supports incremental and differential ESXi backup (CBT/VDDK). Backup to disk, network, Cloud, NAS and LTO Tape. Restore of ESXi and Hyper-V virtual machines also to different hosts. Totally agentless - Backup from the network.

related_products.short_desc: As a fully integrated Desktop-as-a-Service solution (DaaS), we focus on speed and simplicity so you can work faster from anywhere.
related_products.features:
Desktop virtualization doesn't have to be complicated. V2 Cloud is the IT nerd you need. We work closely with Independent Software Vendors, Business owners, Managed Service Providers, IT managers and many others to grow their businesses with the Cloud.

As a fully integrated Desktop-as-a-Service solution (DaaS), we focus on speed and simplicity so you can work faster from anywhere. Let our support team get rid of your worries use your cloud computer safely, quickly and economically.

similar_products.short_desc: Hands-on, customized, powerful virtual experiences in minutes for demos, POCs, customer and employee training, and testing.
similar_products.features:
CloudShare is a leading virtual experience platform that helps software companies increase customer acquisition and retention by creating highly engaging hands-on virtual POCs, demos, and training environments in minutes. 

Our virtual environments are easily replicated in the cloud and purpose-built to generate user engagement that ultimately impacts key business metrics such as customer retention, repeat purchase rates, lower support costs, higher win rates, faster sales cycle, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Virtual Machine Backup and Replication for Hyper-V & VMware - Try it for free for 30 days. (Freeware available for micro-businesses.)
similar_products.features: Altaro VM Backup is a virtual machine backup and replication solution for Hyper-V and VMware. Designed for IT departments, IT resellers and consultants, and Managed Service Providers (MSPs), it provides robust, streamlined, enterprise-level functionality, such as WAN-Optimized Replication, CDP, Augmented Inline Deduplication and more. It is characterized by ease of use, speed, affordability  and a Lightning Fast Support Call Response Guarantee of under 30 seconds. Try it for free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful Cloud Workstations for Graphics Collaboration
similar_products.features: Cloudalize is the cloud platform for software vendors that use game engines for B2B enterprise applications such as architectural visualizations and 3D product configurators. Cloudalize enables the distribution of any app on any device, making a traditional expensive workstation redundant. Cloudalize is also the developer of industry-leading MyGDaaS (GPU-accelerated Desktop-as-a-Service) for GPU-intensive applications such as CAE, CAD, CFD, GIS, 3D, etc.

similar_products.short_desc: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery solution for MSPs.
similar_products.features: Axcient x360Recover is the most reliable, flexible and cost-effective business continuity and disaster recovery (BCDR) solution for MSPs and the SMBs they serve.  x360Recover protects data from cyberthreats with a solution that is simple to deploy and manage. Delivered as a flexible direct-to-cloud or appliance-based deployment, x360Recover covers nearly all BDR use cases-including appliance, server, and cloud-to-cloud-and is built on Axcient's proprietary Chain-Free backup technology.

similar_products.short_desc: Securely deliver all your business-critical apps to any device from the browser without VPNs, for 70% less cost than VDI & DaaS.
similar_products.features: Cameyo is the secure and 70% more cost-effective alternative to virtual desktop products like Citrix & VMware. Cameyo's Virtual App Delivery (VAD) service provides ultra-secure access to all SaaS, legacy Windows & internal apps your people need to be productive on any device - without the cost & complexity of VDI & DaaS. Hundreds of orgs across all industries - incl. Sanmina, Bentley, Newsday, Nordward - utilize Cameyo to deliver business-critical apps to hundreds of thousands of global users.

similar_products.short_desc: Ace Cloud Hosting provides Fully managed Virtual desktop hosting solutions- DaaS, Hosted Virtual Desktop (HVD), Remote Desktop Service
similar_products.features:
Ace Cloud Hosting offers hosted VDI solutions tailor-made for diverse industries. You can choose the desktop solution according to your industry with the option to customize it as per your business type and size.

All our hosted VDI solutions are fully managed, which includes all essential IT services, such as desktop design, implementation, security, and management. We also take care of desktop scaling and software updates, reducing IT hassles as well as capital expenses.

similar_products.short_desc: Google Compute Engine provides practically unlimited computing power using VMs in the cloud.
similar_products.features: Google Compute Engine, the computing arm of Google Cloud Platform, provides practically unlimited computing power using VMs in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud computing platform for VM creation, building and running web-based applications, smart client applications, and XML web services.
similar_products.features: Cloud computing platform for VM creation, building and running web-based applications, smart client applications, and XML web services.

similar_products.short_desc: Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for IT professionals.
similar_products.features:
Start running backups and restores in less than 15 minutes! Comet is a fast, secure all-in-one backup platform for businesses and IT providers. You control your backup environment and storage destination (local, AWS, Google Cloud Storage, Azure, Backblaze, Wasabi, or other S3 storage providers).

Our backup software supports businesses across 120 countries in 12 languages. Simple, profitable pricing. No contracts. Support, updates, replication, and re-branding are all free. 30-day FREE trial!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Backup software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Backup tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Backup software ensures security of critical data by creating redundant copies that can be restored to replace corrupted or lost data.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of VDI tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI) Software provides the back-end infrastructure to create virtual desktop environments. These platforms allow users to create and deploy virtual machines, while granting the ability to run multiple operating systems on a single machine.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtualization software allows multiple virtual operating systems to run on a single physical machine, providing greater productivity. Virtualization software allocates resources to provide greater efficiency of the machines resources. This type of efficiency can be gained on a single machine, or across an entire network of connected machines. Virtualization software is related to IT Management software.
